description: Made to elevate the traditional boat shoe, they crafted the handsome Nohea Moku with an adventurous life in mind. Sure-footed and down for any outdoor exploration, the no-tie laces and stretch bootie construction for barefoot wear yield a shoe that’s ready for land or water.
name: Olukai Nohea Moku - Mens

specs.value: Lightweight mesh upper with a stretch-air mesh tongue and gusset ensures breathability. Elastic lacing system for easy on
The dual-density PU footbed, cushy gel insert, and removable
All-weather, non-marking rubber and gum rubber cupsole with razor siping for traction on wet surfaces
